item.title: How Should I Style My React Application?
item.description: Learn how CSS has evolved and explore pros and cons of different styling solutions for React.

item.title: Analyzing 10+ Years of My Facebook Data
item.description: Which year was I the most active? Who has commented on my pictures the most? How many songs have I streamed?

item.title: Which Back End Should I Use As A Front-End Developer?
item.description: Choosing a service to store data can be confusing and overwhelming for a front-end developer. This comprehensive guide is a choose your own adventure dive into creating your backend.

item.title: How I Turned an Idea into $7K by Teaching Online
item.description: Six months ago, I had an idea for an online course. Today, I've taught students all over the world and made over $7,000 teaching online.

item.title: Create a Dashboard with Next.js API Routes - Unsplash API
item.description: Learn how to use Next.js API routes to integrate with the Unsplash API and retrieve statistics about a user.

item.title: Why Should You Learn Next.js?
item.description: Understand the growth behind JavaScript's hottest web framework and learn why Next.js can help you build web applications faster.

item.title: Everything I Know About Style Guides, Design Systems, and Component Libraries
item.description: A deep-dive on everything I've learned in the past year building style guides, design systems, component libraries, and their best practices.

item.title: Configuring Sentry for Next.js Apps
item.description: Learn how to set up Sentry to capture client-side and server-side exceptions for Next.js applications.

item.title: Migrating to Hugo
item.description: Why I chose this static site generator and the benefits you can receive.
